title: Thunderbird abbrviating new groups
content:
Thunderbird by default abreviates new groups, which makes our review news groups unintelligible. This has been dealt with before, but solutions are not working for me on the newest Thunderbird. Alternative solution :

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/config-editor

I can change the setting mail.server.default.abbreviate, but it does not change the display without a reset. After a reset the setting is back to true.

The link mentions saving the setting with a tick box, but I cannot see a tick box.

Please advise. Thanks, Steve.
creator: steve.barton

title: Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird would not open so I called a technician who set it back up. I have the icon on my desk to, but it will not open and I have to go back to Tunderbird Set up # 128 and reinstall it. What shall I do. Thank you, Treva
creator: queenorsa3

title: I want to customize the default display.
content: I always find it useful. I have one problem. I usually only display [Attachments][Subject][Recipient][Date], but the default displays [Thread][Star], etc., and I have to edit them each time. Is it possible to create a [User default] by changing the settings? Thank you.
creator: sawadaj.osam

title: where to setup auto-reply
content:
I've recently installed Thunderbird 128. I want to setup auto-reply but I have not found where to enable it despite looking through Settings and Account Settings.

I have composed an auto-reply and saved it as a Template - however, I cannot find where it is saved.

Also, the Actions in Manage Message Filters does not list "Reply with Template".

Any idea how to resolve this, please?
creator: acgjsy

title: no email
content: My Thunderbird emails suddenly stopped coming through today or this afternoon. 11/18/2024
creator: a.nancyz1942

title: Justify alignment for sending emails with line wrapping
content:
I'm trying to configure justified alignment for my sent emails that have line wrapping.

My sent emails are already line-wrapped to 72 characters, but the line-wrapped content doesn't have justified alignment. I tried setting Format > Align > Justify and Alignment (icon) > Justify in email compose window, but it only justifies content in the editor, not receiver's end.

Is there any setting that achieves my desired effect?
creator: nagidrop

title: TB 228.4 will not replicate format from Word in one user account, but does in other user acct.
content: I upgraded from 115 to 228.4, but now 228.4 will not replicate text formatting (style, color, bold) pasted from a Word document, as it did using 115. Yet the same program (228.4), same computer, on the other User Account works properly. Is there a config setting that might cure the problem, or anything else, perhaps a missing file in my ill-working Profile directory? I am at a loss as this feature is very important to me. (I'm also a technical novice.)
creator: DCB2

content: I keep getting this screen and doesn't do anything whether I hit allow or deny (and I can't send you a screenshot!)

title: OAuth
content: I have a Samsung Tablet that I have setup for a friend. He uses Thunderbird on his desktop computer and I have installed Thunderbird for Android onto his new Samsung Tablet 9A+. He has his email with Telus and they have outsourced their Email to Google. As such his new Tablet does not have OAuth2 as an option when setting up his Tablet. Is there anyway to get around this issue and get him onto his Email using Thunderbird? Robert PS The Version is 128.4.3esr
creator: robertdaleweir

title: Thunderbird for Android
content: I am using Thunderbird 128.4.3esr (64-bit). My understanding is that I can export current desktop accounts to Thunderbird for Android, including Hotmail. However, when I select Export for Mobile in settings, 2 of my 3 accounts appear, but Hotmail is missing.
creator: alanbo

title: Search in Body produced no results even if search string matches many emails.  Body search not available
content:
Hey There,

Hope everyone is doing great!

The body search feature is missing in my Thunderbird. Searching for any text that I know appears in a body also returns no results. How do I enable this?

Please let me know if it's a setting that prevents this option from showing up. ( Just a thought, if it is some setting, could it be grayed out instead with a tool tip text to show why it's grayed out instead of removing the option completely? )

Cheers, Tom
creator: tom479

title: Gmail in Thunderbird
content:
Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account nov06tmi1973@gmail.com This will allow Mozilla Thunderbird Email to: See, edit, download and permanently delete you contacts By clicking Allow, you allow this app and Google to use your information in accordance with their respective privacy policies. You can change this and other Account Permissions at any time. Deny Allow


I click Allow and that whole screen freezes (it will do the same if I try Deny) It will not accept Gmail as an account. I cannot even send you this email because it is a Gmail What is going on? I am at a loss

Tim
creator: nov06tmi1973

title: Moving Thunderbird into Application proecess is not finishing
content:
I'm moving from iMac 12.7 to Mac-mini 15.1 and Thunderbird's old files cannot be imported. So, I deleted the failed Thunderbird app in the new Mac-mini and download a new Thunderbird to the Mac-mini. I made sure it's the desktop version with US English for Mac before hitting the download key. After downloading the Thunderbird 128.4.3esr.dmg and double-clicking the file and moving Thunderbird into the "Applications" directory. This last step seems to go on forever, that is, when I tried to eject the Thunderbird's download, it claim the download is NOT finished. What did I do wrong, and how to fix this problem?

Roger (magian@att.net)
creator: magian1

title: Thunderbird doesn't want to install
content: I download 64 bit exe on win 10. I run it, it unpacks, asks for what user I want to run TB as, I pick one, program closes, I never see it again. Done it multiple times, nothing. App just silently refuses to install

title: Cannot remembre password for Thunderbird
content: My computer recently fried due to Lightning and trying to get into my Thunderbird account but cannot remember my password. Need to resurrect Thunderbird on new computer. Please help. Cheers George
creator: sanfordrose

title: URL miss spelling at Downloading Thunderbird
content:
Please be advised that when I tried to download Thunderbird program using following URL, I got "404 Not Found" Error. URL has miss spelling "ja" should be "Ja-JP-mac". https://www.thunderbird.net/ja/download/

（Wrong） https://download-installer.cdn.mozilla.net/pub/thunderbird/releases/128.4.3esr/mac/ja/Thunderbird%20128.4.3esr.dmg

（Right） https://download-installer.cdn.mozilla.net/pub/thunderbird/releases/128.4.3esr/mac/Ja-JP-mac/Thunderbird%20128.4.3esr.dmg

Good day!
creator: mo496

title: thunderbird
content: I canot create an account @orange.fr in Thunderbird
creator: fvie

title: Calendar - error
content:
Good afternoon.

I will describe the problem step by step. There is a mail server. It has a web version of mail (SOGo). Created an account for the meeting room. Created a shared calendar and signed mail users with rights to create entries in this calendar. In mail clients connected calendars over the network with user credentials. When creating an event in the calendar, added participants. Participants receive an email with an invitation. Immediately, when the email arrives to the participant, there are buttons to accept, but as soon as the event is synchronised and added to the calendar, the buttons disappear. Why? An error occurs when clicking on the refresh button. Why? How to set up a shared calendar correctly? Is there any instruction?
creator: sanch13sanch
